sect1.title: Installing Patch-&patch-version;
sect1.para: The Patch package contains a program for modifying files.
Patch installation depends on: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Glibc, Grep, Make, Sed.

sect2.title: Short description
sect2.para: patch modifies files according to a patch file. A patch file normally is a difference listing created with the diff program. By applying these differences to the original files, patch creates the patched versions. Using patches instead of entirely new tarballs to keep your sources up-to-date can save you a lot of download time.
